text: Gabriel Guarda (born Fernando Guarda Geywitz; 19 January 1928 â€“ 23 October 2020), was a Chilean historian and architect. He was part of the editorial committee of the journal Historia after it was created in 1961. In 1984 he received the Chilean National History Award. Guarda was born in Valdivia, Chile. He studied architecture at the Catholic University of Chile. Guarda died on 23 October 2020 in Santiago de Chile, aged 92. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chilean writers Category:Architects Category:Chilean historians
